name: Turret Drop
description:
Turret Drop

Turret Drop is an third person arcade shooting game that want players to defend as long as they can.

This is a prototype version of the game, This prototype game was concepted and created in 7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student developers at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University.

The game was made during may 22nd by:

Miaosen.li(3D), Jin ke(3D), Zichen Xu (3D) and Weichao Li(Programming)

(Inspired by the game beach head 2002)
